comment_body:
Having been buried below deadlines myself, I know that this stuff can fuck with your mind and make you forget even the simplest things... and so I thought about how easy it would be for someone... or something to trick you.

If you enjoyed this story check out my [**author page**](https://rehnwriter.com/) and also check out all of my talented friends at [**r/TheCrypticCompendium**](https://www.reddit.com/r/TheCrypticCompendium/).
